for i in range(int(input())):
    x = int(input())
    v = input()
    c = len(v) / 2
    c = int(c)
    b = v[:c]
    n = v[c:]
    z = 0
    q = 0
    for i in b:
        if i == n[z]:
            q = q + 1
        z = z + 1
    if q == len(b):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for i in range(t):

    if s_half2 + s_half1 == s:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    print('YES' if s[:n // 2] == s[n // 2:] else 'NO')

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    S = str(input())
    n = int(N / 2)
    A = S[0:n]
    B = S[n:N]
    if A + B and B + A == S:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    mid = n // 2
    a = ''
    b = ''
    a += s[:mid]
    b += s[mid:]
    if a == b:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

def stri(a, b):
    c = a // 2
    k = b[0:c]
    t = b[c:]
    x = t + k
    if x == b:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = int(input())
    b = input()
    stri(a, b)
